titleStmt.title: Tvvo letters or embassies The one sent by the states of Bohemia, to the Elector of Saxony: the other from the Popes Holines to the Emperour, concerning the troubles of Germany.
titleStmt.author: Bohemia (Země). Sněm.
Paul V, Pope, 1552-1621. aut
Barlow, William, of Amsterdam.
Johann Georg I, Elector of Saxony, 1585-1656.
Ferdinand II, Holy Roman Emperor, 1578-1637.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
